docTitle.titlePart: Statement to the Tuscon Planned Parenthood Annual Fundraising Drive

sourceDesc.bibl: Mrs. Slee is Honored SpeakerTuscon Daily Citizen 01/10/53

doc.headNote: Sanger addressed a meeting of the Tuscon Planned Parenthood Center's annual fundraising drive; for more detail on those who attended the meeting see the Tuscon Daily Citizenarticle.

docBody.head: Mrs. Slee is Honored Speaker
docBody.p: "The conducting, co-ordinating, and promoting of scientific research in the field of human reproduction must take precedence over all other projects planned and supported by the Planned Parenthood Federation of America," stated Mrs. Margaret Sanger Slee, speaking to the campaign workers for the Tuscon Planned Parenthood clinic's annual fund raising drive.
